name: places/ChIJh9cENe9ZwokRqx4CN7cRWhA
formattedAddress: 501 E 87th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 501 E 87th St, New York, NY 10128-7665, USA

originalText.text: I highly recommend Studio DLG as I had an excellent experience working with David. Most importantly, the outcome of his work was top notch. I did not start the project with strong ideas as to what I was looking for, but through a thorough, organized and patient design process David developed and refined a plan which turned out to be just what I wanted. Equally important, working with David was a pleasure throughout the project. He seeks input and guides the design process gently, working together to reach decisions. He takes full ownership of implementation, making sure that everything is made and installed as it should be. When the inevitable issues arose he quickly handled them without delay. His team of craftspeople, movers and installers were all excellent and they also took pride in their work. In conclusion, David does great work, and does it in a very professional way. I would use him again and I recommend him highly.

originalText.text: David is absolutely wonderful to work with! Great design sense, attention to detail, and follow through. He always follows up when he says he will and does a great job with the designs as well as managing every step of the project. I am so happy with the work he's done on my apartment and can't recommend him enough!

text.text: David is absolutely wonderful to work with! Great design sense, attention to detail, and follow through. He always follows up when he says he will and does a great job with the designs as well as managing every step of the project. I am so happy with the work he's done on my apartment and can't recommend him enough!

originalText.text:
I've engaged David for two projects over the past 4 years--he is an excellent designer, and I wholeheartedly recommend him.

On the design side, he is knowledgeable and has excellent taste. The ideas he brought to the table not only aligned with what I was looking for, but managed to be truly interesting and unique. In several situations, we wound up taking paths that I didn't even realize were possible...much less would I have had any idea how to execute. Additionally, there have been items that weren't on my radar where he made strong recommendations that paid off beautifully...resulting in a space that was more interesting, cozy, and cohesive.

Notably, he is excellent on the business side as well. He communicates well, is responsive, and follows up with vendors when/if issues arise with products/services. And he does not try to upsell--many times I've pushed to change or upgrade an item, and he actually "reeled me in" from spending money unnecessarily, focusing me instead on high-impact/high-value changes.

Finally, on a personal level he's a pleasure to interact with. I'd hire him again--or recommend him--without hesitation.
